title: FandomFare
description: A media deep-dive podcast where Sam and Midge look way too deep into media they like

title: Negro Jump
description: Comedians Jarrod Fortune and Cordero Wilson interview guest and give their takes on everything anime and nerdy!

title: Toon Along! Podcast
description:
Welcome to Toon Along! Let's dive back into the Retro World of Cartoons, Movies, TV Shows and Video Games, from the 80's, 90's and 2000's. Join me as I watch, play review and comment on all the greatest things that made us kids back in the day. So come and Toon Along! with me as we try to relive those nostalgic moments as well as trying to create new ones while using the fuel from the past. 

Check out the Brand new website coming in 2021, I will have everything Toon Along! related there sort of a Home Base if you will. 


You can find the Toon Along! Podcast on any major podcast app, and check out the other platforms as well for more related content:


-YOUTUBE-

title: passtime thinker podcast

From Southern California weebs talk about Cars, grassroots track events, anime, and the Otaku culture. As well as Cover local events, introduce local business owners and anything else we want! 

Follow us on IG Twitch Facebook and Twitter @UnacceptedPod


Website: UnacceptedPod.com

title: Pitching A Tent Podcast
description: Everyone knows its easier to pitch a tent with your friends!

title: Devilfruit: Choose Anime
description: Join in the circle as we laugh, REVIEW and argue about anime and then DRAFT CHARACTERS from whatever show we just watched, and make them COMPETE in imaginary trials known as Chicken Bowls! Your hosts Ethan, Jacob and Joe, won't stop until they dive into every genre in the world of anime. It's gonna be an interesting ride to say the least!

title: The Geek Realm with Hose
description: A podcast for all the geeks in the world to speak on many topics, regarding comics, film, tv and more!

title: The Part Where Podcast
description: The Part Where is a podcast where three best friends talk about their love and hate for movies, tv shows, and the parts within them.
author_name: John Scott Massey, Hailey Buck, Megan Patterson

title: Lights, Camera, Conversation!
description: Do you like discussing films, TV, animation, documentaries and visual media in general? Lights, Camera, Conversation delves into these discussions, presented by Lotty Wiltshaw, Maddy Goddard, Steph Taylor, Byron Sheldon and David Mead of Shot Blast Media. From advertising trends to their favourite directors, if you're a film and TV geek this is the perfect podcast for you!

title: The Misadventures of La Squadra
description:
The podcast that documents the Misadventures of Mista, Kangs and the rest of the fuckers. 

We talk about games, movies, music, shitty mobile games, alcohol, JoJo and weeb shit. IF you believe in the you that believes in me, you might believe in this podcast. 

Yall Tryin to do a raid??

title: We-Booze!
description:
We're a couple of weebs who like to drink and talk about anime! Join us as we try our best to make sense of the plot from our designated drunk! Follow us on Facebook! and don't forget to subscribe to us on YouTube!!

https://www.facebook.com/webooze915/

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRrsWJOKoVIuJvmRwbRD1EQ?view_as=subscriber

title: Whose Anime Is It Anyway?
description: A conversational podcast about every anime I've ever watched that has been finished. The discussion brings in a co-host every week from my personal life, in which the show is connected to that person and we rate the show at the end of the podcast.

title: The Switch Clicks Podcast
description: Join a group of long-time childhood friends as they delve into the latest in the world of video games and movies on "The Switch Clicks Podcast". From analyzing new releases to sharing their opinions on classic favorites, this podcast is the perfect place for any media enthusiast. Tune in wherever you listen to your podcasts!

title: 老二次元
description: 《老二次元》是由二次元深度用户大九和星辉一起主持的电台。他们从小热爱动画、游戏、轻小说。那些你感兴趣的二次元话题，他们都想聊一聊。

title: NyaaCast
description: Hello my name is ErisQT, nyaa~! Im proud to be the creator of the NyaaCast. Im Non-Binary Neko trying to do her best to entertain and create new content.

title: Animanga
description: A podcast reviewing/discussing anime and manga in the context of art, philosophy, politics, and whatever else pertains.

title: Balcony Banter
description: A couple of dorks, their friends, some nice cold beers, and a balcony under the stars. Come hang out with us!

title: Crappy Anime Showdown
description: Welcome to Crappy Anime Showdown!! This podcast is dedicated to pitting anime against one another to find out which one is the most deplorable while still being entertaining enough to watch.  Come join us as we watch anime and try to enjoy ourselves! Edited by JW with art by our good friend Derek!

title: Geek Giant Podcast
description: Welcome to the funniest anime podcast on the internet. Catch us every week and follow us @geekgiantpodcast

title: Part-Time Otaku
description: Grant and Dave catch up on their favourite anime, shows & more.

title: The Nani Boyz
description: Just some weebs talking about anime. Weekly reviews of currently running anime, reviews of past anime, and various random anime/geek topics every week. We stream live on twitch every Sunday evening. www.twitch.tv\narchzz23

title: Animation Revaluation
description: Some friends spend too much time talking about animation-related things such as anime, cartoons, music videos, and movies, in an effort to entertain themselves as well as the listener, and to help themselves understand and explore new topics.

title: Trademark™
description: A satirical dark topic podcast, we talk about media, recent events, personal stories, stuff we like, and whatever is just on our minds.

title: GATCHA
description:
Bienvenue sur GATCHA : votre podcast One Piece animé par Thomasama, Loïc la polémique, Great Teacher Wilfried et Adam.
Chaque semaine au programme : reviews des derniers chapitres, news, discussions et théories autour du chef d'oeuvre d'Oda.
Enjoy !
author_name: Thomasama, Loïc la polémique, GT. Wilfired & Adam

title: The Minimum Wage Podcast
description: Three idiots talk about nothing.

title: Disney Matter
description:
A brand new podcast talking all things Disney.

From the newest releases to the weird history, come join Jack and a few very good friends as we look at it all.

Remember, if it matters, make sure its a Disney Matter.

title: Boiled Over
description: A podcast all about animation! Listen to interviews with contemporary independent animators from around the world with host Lije Morgan.

title: Paper Play Action
description: The podcast that brings new entertainment to your eyes and ears. As well as, news on Anime, Manga, Video games, Movies, Comic books and more. Join our rotating cast of characters as we rant and rave about our newest findings in the world of media, as well as other topics. We also have a Patreon where you can support us a well. 20% of all proceeds will be given to a charity of our choosing every month. Check our twitter, @paper_action for info on what charity we are donating to that month as well as updates on what we've been checking out. Email us question to answer on the podcast at paperplayaction@gmail.com.

title: Words & Personality
description: Hot topics, random thoughts, gossip brought to you by El Scribbler and Big Daddy Moe.

title: Anime Today
description: Anime Today is a review podcast that is here to discuss everything genre relevant. Daniel-san, Don-kun, and Andrew-sama want to give back to the Japanese medium that provides us with incredible content, an inclusive community, and a diverse culture by celebrating Anime both new and old. In this biweekly podcast, listen in as the co-hosts give you a detailed review of new seasonal releases, as well as deep dives into classics and favorites throughout Anime’s history.

title: Degenerate Hour
description: This Podcast is made by anime fans, for anime fans.

title: Una Partida Más
description: Tres amigos se reúnen cada semana para platicar de sus aficiones y pasatiempos.
author_name: Alejandro Gómez, Emiliano Hernández, Pedro Mercado

title: Glowing Week Point
description: Jon and Wombat discuss what games they've played this week, different tropes, mechanics, and industry bullshit, and scream about game facts every week.

title: Where to Start
description: Hello all Patrick P. here aka P-Squared and I want to help all those just getting into the Japanese culture of anime feel more comfortable and not to overwhelmed on where to start. As well as giving you insight of what's happening in mainstream manga/anime news. Lets have laughs lets have fun and most certainly lets enjoy the anime and manga we are reading.

title: Mao was a Mensch
description:
A Podcast where we allegedly review Beer.

But mostly just shoot the shit.

title: The Home For Anime
description: Welcome to the home for anime! This is a place where all anime fans can come and feel like they belong. Just sit back and listen to host Callie talk about different anime, manga and light novels.

title: Traversing the Chanverse
description: A weekly podcast dedicated to mapping out the ever-expanding Jackie Chan Cinematic Universe. @chanversepod

title: Anime Enthusiast Podcast
description:
Welcome to the Anime Enthusiast Podcast where we like to talk about anime! We have 4 members; Zack, Mason, Justin, and Rin, and we all come from different levels of anime watchers. On today's episode we go over the first anime that got us started, our most re-watched anime, and finally our guilty pleasure anime. We sincerely hope you enjoy listening to us talk, fool around, and sometimes rant.  Rate and subscribe for more content!

Social - 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AnimeEnthusPod
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/animeenthusiastpodcast/

title: Please Stand By...
description: Hi my name is Austin and i'm joined by my partner Carson.We've wanted to start a podcast for over a year and a half.In our new podcast Please Stand By we will be talking about our different stories as teenagers and other thing we like such as video games,  anime.

title: Socks On
description: We're a couple of friends and filmmakers who love talking movies, shows, anime, games, and just about anything else. Follow us on twitter @SocksPodcast

title: Cel Shade
description: Like cartoons? Like hate watching? Like White Claw? Then have we got the podcast for you! Join Nick, Tyler, and Alfred the kitty as we discuss the wonderful world of animation.

title: Anyways, Piou Piou
description: Hi! I'm Piou Piou and this is a podcast where I talk about my interests, stories from my life, and other miscellaneous things that cross my mind. Join me in this podcast if you like hearing other opinions, fun stories, or even if you enjoy a voice in the background of daily life.

title: Out of the Drying Pan: A Pokémon the Series Podcast
description: A podcast where three filthy casual Millennials look back at the English dub of Pokémon the Series, and pick it apart relentlessly. We love Pokémon! We also love laughing and a long-running toy commercial is a great place to get some laughs. Join us on our rewatch of the anime as we discuss it, any other Pokémon media we feel like, and really just about anything.

title: GREEN BUBBLE TEA
description: GREEN BUBBLE TEA is a weekly show that focuses on East Asian music (Korean, Japanese, Chinese, Southeast Asian) & pop culture (anime, K-Pop) & social justice topics

title: Fan Fatales
description:
Join hosts Emma and Gaby as they discuss being women in fandoms and fan culture. They like to discuss just general goings-on in the fandoms that they are particularly interested in. Tune in to listen to them talk about some of their favorite movies and memories. You may find a guest or two running around but no worries there's always some fun conversation to be a part of. Episodes come out weekly on Wednesdays at 8 am Eastern, 5 am Pacific.

follow us on Instagram and Twitter: @fanfatalespod

title: Cable Trash Cast
description: Just a couple of friends talking about media in general in our free time

title: Vaguely Anime
description: A variety podcast vaguely about anime, hosted by 5 friends in a basement. New episodes every Monday at 12pm!

title: The Official Nameless Podcast (TONP)
description: Two friends just talking about whatever we or other people want. Either related or unrelated to nerd culture sub-topics and going on multiple tangents within those topics.

title: The Buddy System Show
description: Join Dabber Jones and Smokey as they show the world what the Buddy System is all about! Helping friends and having fun along the way!

description: Two intrepid young twenty-something losers talk about nerd culture topics (mostly anime and video games) as well as other miscellaneous topics like going to prison and world war two.

title: Gundam Explained Podcast
description: The Gundam Explained Podcast is from the Gundam Explained YouTube channel. The cast is up every Friday, and discusses everything Gundam - from Gunpla, to anime, and even the latest Gundam news. Listen in, follow the YouTube channel and join on Discord!

title: DeltaWolves - A Dystopian/Sci-Fi Audio Movie
description: DeltaWolves: A revolutionary new dystopian/science fiction podcast, which pushes the envelope of creativity using an audio podcast experience. This' a movie experience without the visual. Listen to action-packed episodes, that will leave you jumping out of your seat. So close your eyes, and let your mind's imagination visualize a new world.

title: Radio Moon Podcast
description:
Bienvenidos al nuevo formato de Radio Moon, Radio Moon Podcast! 
Unete en cada episodio para disfrutar de entrevistas exclusivas, informacion, y todo lo que siempre quisite saber sobre el mundo y el fandom de Sailor Moon! 
Bienvenidxs  a la familia lunar!

title: Animelytical Podcast
description: Animelytical is a female founded, pro-black podcast with members that stretch from the west coast to the east coast of the United States. We cover everything from anime and manga news to k-pop and gaming. We have created a space where critical thinking meets controlled chaos. Tune in every Tuesday 8:30pm EST on Twitter Spaces and join the episode live by following us on Twitter @AnimeLyticalPod

title: Eighth Gate Podcast
description: Welcome to the Eighth Gate Podcast! Here you can find us (Edgardo and Leo) talk about anything anime related, life stories, and conspiracy’s here and there all while cracking cold ones. Hope you guys enjoy hearing us just being us.

title: Anime Communion
description: Pastor Holy (“holy_dont_lie” on social media) and Eli Levi Uchiha. Come from two different universes to discuss Anime. An Explicit Conversation on wether the anime in question is “Cash,Smash, or Trash”. While sometimes getting off topic, and other times giving “personal experiences”. This Podcast is not for the faint of heart. If your someone who like a more mature conversation about anime, and more maturer conversations in general. JOIN THE Communion, ANIME COMMUNION!!!!!!!

title: Just Another Podcast
description: Just as the title suggests, we are just another podcast in this influx of new podcasts and people wanting to put content out into the world. We are a group of black men who just wish to share our insights on the world and have fun with whatever topic presents itself to us.

description: Black New Yorkers talkin bout music, nerd stuff, and life

An anime podcast for the professional binger and newbie weeb. Join Bridget and Lauren as they watch an anime, break it down a few episodes at a time, and discuss the art, storyline, and details that go into an anime.

description: A group of friends discuss all things "geeky": anime, comics, tech, video games etc. Hosted by Anisa, Jake, Carii and Ez.

title: MC Anime Podcast
description:
We are a fandom related podcast dedicated to anime, geek culture, and Japanese Asethics or Asian Studies. Family oriented programming and expect open forum discussion and conversational casual. Join as we discuss the topics important at hand and have an unique perspective for those tuning in. Episodes will vary in content and 60 minutes in length most of the time. The schedule for publishing are Mondays, Wednesdays, Fridays, and sometimes Saturdays. Expect 24 hours on third party podcast sites for podcasts to show fully. 
 RSS Feed will have most updated episodes. If you like the content please join us on patreon and support the channel. Geatly appreciate it! 

https://www.patreon.com/BlogMCAnime

title: Back to the Point
description: Back to the Point! We're here talking about movies, comics, tv shows and really anything that strikes our interest. The official podcast of CloseCall Entertainment means that we offer our unique view on these subjects. We may get off topic occasionally but we always get Back to the Point!

description:
Marie y Arath son geeks, gamers, fanboys y si hay que decirlo Arath es medio Otaku también. Y en este podcast nos cuentan de todos sus gustos, disgustos y la realidad de vivir como pareja siendo Geeks. 

Síguelos en sus redes para que puedas ver la realidad de lo que es vivir como Geek.

Redes Arath:

title: The Weeb Crew
description: Common side effects of watching The Weeb Crew may include: Nervousness, agitation, anxiety, sleep problems, stomach pain, loss of appetite, weight loss, nausea, vomiting, dizziness, palpitations, headache, vision problems, increased heart rate, increased blood pressure, seweating, skin rash, psychosis, and numbness, tingling, or cold feeling in your hands or feet. The Weeb Crew may interact with blood thinners, clonidine, dobutamine, epinephrine, isoproterenol, cold/allergy medicine that contains phenylephrine (a decongestant), potassium citrate, sodium acetate, sodium bicarbonate, citric acid and potassium citrate, sodium citrate and citric acid, medications to treat high or low blood pressure, stimulant medications, diet pills, seizure medicines, or antidepressants. Tell your doctor all medications and supplements you use.

title: 69.420 FM
description: Where Shion and Antzzz wont stop talking :>

title: Entertainment Quest
description: Welcome to Entertainment Quest! We hope to take you on journey after journey with our adventures as modern day geeks. We'll cover topics such as videogames, movies & tv (including anime), superhero/comic book related info and more! A talk show explaining our lives in these worlds as it is today and how it was growing up in the time we did. A fun cast of friends who all find joy and passion in the same things. Thank you for all your support in advance and make sure to follow us on Twitter @EntertainQuest

title: Simmering w/ Ramen Raiders
description: The Ramen Raiders survive off the 4 essentials of life: Food. Music. Gaming. Anime. Throw it all together, let it simmer, and you've got yourself a podcast.

title: Nostalgia, Plus Ultra Podcast
description: Welcome to the Nostalgia, Plus Ultra Podcast! Just two dudes nerding out over our favorite things: Anime, Video Games, TV, Music, and More!

title: We're Not Experts Podcast
description: A podcast about life from our perspective. Everything said from this channel is from our perspective. As the name states we are not experts, just people living normal lives. Keep in mind if we are wrong about something you are free to comment and educate us. We just want to have a space where we can be ourselves. Stay blessed!

title: What's In My Head Podcast
description: Welcome to the Whats In My Head Podcast! A podcast where I chat with the titans within the animation and pop culture industry. Follow me as I bring you a piece of your childhood, each and every week!

title: Two Gays and a Digimon Podcast
description:
Welcome to the newest podcast in the Digital World! Join Digidestined, Michael and Adam as they walk through the Digimon franchise! Adam is a life long fan and is introducing his boyfriend Michael to his favorite franchise ever. 

This podcast is obviously hosted by two queer identifying people, we will not be discussing any explicit content as Digimon is meant for children, but we are two adults who are are sometimes going to say grown up things. We will not be diving into the more, explicit, aspects of the Digimon fan community, but we may occasionally bring up more adult topics, if you are or know of any young people who are interested in listening to our podcast please be cautioned that we may discuss more uncomfortable topics or topics that may be deemed inappropriate for younger listeners. We will be issuing warnings as the episodes are posted. 

We do not tolerate any hate comments left on our social media, we are in support of progressive social movements and will occasionally highlight and touch on these topics to a degree deemed appropriate by us. If these kind of topics bother you, please refrain from commenting on our content. 

We are beyond excited to begin this journey with anyone who will listen! We welcome all, fans old and new! Come listen to our show!

title: Office Goblin Podcast
description:
The goblins welcome you to the story you didn’t ask for: of how planets aligned in the Midwest and two students met in a department stocked with K-cups and gratuitous amounts of scholastic stress. Good vibes only.
P.S. We curse.
P.P.S Drop us a line - officegoblinpodcast@gmail.com

title: Top Weekly Anime and Entertainment Stories
description:
First Podcast in the history of yaya anitainment! We are extremely excited to open up this space to talk about the top anime and entertainment stories of the week. This will be an unedited yet somewhat scripted space in which we talk about our top stories but also include recommended content by our audience. 

Find us: 
Twitter: @yayaanitainment
YouTube: @yayaanitainment

title: Animated By Faith
description: Animator and movie buff, Jared Bupp, takes you behind the scenes of some of his favorite films. Sharing not only his love of movies but also his relationship with God. James 1:17 says, " Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and cometh down from the Father of lights...". That's precisely what Bupp thinks a movie can be...a perfect, life-changing gift. Join him as you are invited to hear stories from some of your favorite artists and filmmakers from your childhood, and learn how God has animated their lives.

title: Toon Nation
description: Toon Nation is a podcast where two grown-ass niggas, August & Code, talk about cartoons and anime.

title: Trio Yello Podcast
description: Just three friends chattin and vibin. A podcast filled with weird stuff and unusual experiences.

title: Face Character Rejects
description: Every kid thinks life will be a Disney movie until they grow up and realize they’re more likely to be friends with the Ugly Stepsisters than Cinderella. Madi Evans and Keith Maultbay are two BFFs and the hilarious hosts of “Face Character Rejects,” a new Disney movie recap podcast. Join Madi and Keith as they dive deep into the Disney vaults, exploring some of your favorite (and maybe not-so-favorite) films, spreading the love and poking some fun at all things from the House of Mouse. New episodes arrive weekly. This show is NSFW and intended for adults ONLY.

title: Hanging Out With
description: Want to travel back to a time where you and your dumb friends shared and argued over media? That's what we hope to accomplish, creating the nostalgic feeling of a film school party. Join the Hanging Out With Cast as we dive into why media matters to us, with a blend of a night out at the bar with buds, to critical analysis and deep dives into our favorite bits of media.  HOW-Casts will be divided into two types; HOW Friends, these are more periodic with a fun catch up with the Cast, talking about things they have watched or played recently and what they like and dont like about them. HOW Media, these will be deep dives into one topic with long form discussion with the Cast about that topic specifically.

title: NaruhoPod
description: Mas que un podcast, una conversación de amigos sobre anime. Debates, novedades, y mucho más de este mundillo. Sumate al vivo los miércoles a las 20:30 (Argentina) en twitch.tv/naruhopod

title: Gaming Theater Podcast
description: Welcome to Gaming Theater Podcast where some of your favorite members of the YouTube Channel Gaming Theater Presents discuss different topics inspired by episodes and subjects from Gaming Theater Presents. These can be story elements that we want to explore, or expand on episodes and talk about things that we could not fit in our normal YouTube episodes. Some of the topics may feature discussions on topics outside of our normal scope and not limited to things such as storytelling, tropes, films, animation, tv shows, comics, books, history, mythology, tabletop games, video games, game design and so much more. Stay a while, listen, and give us a bit of time to give you a little exp boost.

title: Itz Kenny Powerz
description: Welcome to the Kenny Powerz Podcast, Where I Give You Updates and Deep Dives in Gaming Culture!

title: The Host Club
description: Welcome guests to the Host Club, your weekly anime and manga podcast! Join your hosts Beth, Kelsey, and Sydney as they discuss everything from Shojo to Shonen and everything in between!

title: Canned Thoughts
description: Come join and talk about all your random toilet thoughts with us!

title: Trending Hobby
description: Un podcast en donde exploramos el anime, manga, coleccionables, videojuegos y toda la cultura que fuimos descubriendo al crecer.

title: Bat Therapy: Psychology of Batman and other Comic Superheroes
description: Exploring your favorite comic book characters through the lens of clinical psychology. What is a psychologist to do when they have a passion for mental health treatment as well as all things Batman? They start a podcast, of course! This podcast lets you be a fly on the wall (or a bat in the cave), listening in on a friendship built out of a love for talking Batman and other superheroes, comics, and the everyday struggle to achieve mental health and happiness. Emilia (psychologist) and Keeden (educator and professional nerd) want to help every person – every graphic novel aficionado, every superhero lover, every cosplayer, every geek and nerd – have health and healing from life’s struggles. Learn how and why characters from your favorite comic storylines suffer as well as where their resilience truly shines. Join us in practicing skills as if we are these fictional characters in order to learn how they, and you, can achieve some peace of mind and mental health recovery. This podcast is NOT a way to receive mental health treatment, services, or personal advice.
author_name: Dr. Emilia Brown and Keeden Hopkins

title: The Ting My Opinion on everyting and anyting
description: i am just starting my podcast i am going to be having random topics and random guest join my community and watch me grow

title: Ganbaru Podcast
description: Tres amigos, con opiniones cuestionables, hablan sobre manga y anime.

title: As Queer as a Painting
description: As Queer as a Painting is a biweekly podcast where Alex "So Fabulous" Marcy will react to comics, cartoons, anime, movies, TV series. Giving a queer perspective on art & media. Dramatic readings, interviews, reviews, everything you want from a media podcast!

title: ALL NIGHT DELI
description: scripted, sci-fi podcast about a Caribbean women-led mafia fighting over their designer drug cartel, when a portal to an alternate earth is discovered

title: Ali Talks
description: A Biweekly Podcast where Ali & Manny talk about anime (and other stuff).  Spoilers for everything in the title of the episode.

title: The Weeb Cult
description: The Weeb Cult Podcast is a show that places emphasis on Anime and Manga culture with opinions on shows, manga, news on anime and reviews by our two hosts, AD and BB. Join us every 2 weeks for a new episode covering seasonal anime and hot takes on episodes each week.

title: Pressing Issues!
description: The comic book podcast where we take two comics of a similar theme and press them together, to see which comes out on top! Hosted by Joe Brown and Rowan Grover. Produced by Coen de Groot. Cover art by Lane Lloyd.

title: Electrómusic
description: Una de las mejores formas de escuchar música de tu agrado

title: Anime Bros Podcast Show
description: Love anime? So do we. For years we have talked about anime and the characters we love the most. Join us as we talked about overarching anime themes like brotherhood, little sister complex and human instrumentality, answer anime's biggest questions like, "Is Piccolo Black?" and "Who is your biggest anime crush?" We'll take deep dives into the genres most recognizable titles like Neon Genesis Evangelion, Cowboy Bebop, Naruto, and much more! These discussions will get deep, so grab your favorite drink and buckle up!

title: 2Geeks1Noob
description:
We gather friends of similar interests (and maybe not so similar) to discuss, joke, learn more about and generally have fun with "Geek Culture".

Make sure to follow us on instagram @2geeks1noob for updates on new episodes!
Also, to answer any of the listener questions we pose to you guys, email us at 2geeks1noobpodcast@gmail.com

description: <3

title: Time Pals

Welcome! 
We are excited to post our very own podcast for Cosplay Café LLC. We will discuss anime, manga, and our cosplay tea blends. Our teas flavor and color are made to represent a character, character move, or anime. We look forward to sharing our Otaku world with you all!

description: Every medium has its meta. We discuss what we're watching, playing, and sometimes take a trip down memory lane. We give our thoughts, opinions and ideas. Join us and chime in.

title: Green Meadow Days
description:
Temporary hiatus for a couple weeks! We're excited to come back :)

An organized ramble about the persons and happenings in the world of Adventure Time! We are two siblings that explore both completely unimportant tidbits in the Land of Ooo as well as surprisingly real parallels with our lived experiences that touch our hearts and uplift our spirits in the hopes that we might share some laughs and make your days just a tad bit better :)

Submit fan-mail at: greenmeadowdays@gmail.com

Full transcripts available on our public website: https://rss.com/podcasts/greenmeadowdays/

anime & manga

title: Pelotón DeltaZ
description:
Éramos un grupo de frikis que arreglaban el mundo gamer mientras almorzaban al igual que un cuñado arregla el país delante de una cerveza.

Hasta que un lumbreras dijo en voz alta que con nuestras conversaciones se haría un buen programa de radio. El valiente del grupo se marcó un "Barney Stinson" diciendo reto aceptado. El colgado le siguió. Y el pringado se vio arrastrado.

Y aquí estamos, haciendo un intento de algo parecido a un podcast. Porque seamos sinceros... Esto va a ser de todo menos un podcast...

https://linktr.ee/pelotondeltaz

On "Consume Content" we help you answer one of the modern world's most nagging question; "What should I watch next?"

Every episode, we recommend an excellent piece of content we feel most people have missed. 

In the endless ocean of content in the world, we're here to help you find the best stuff to enjoy.

description: This Page is Dedicated to the Podcast, "When a Gay Girl meets a Trans Girl." During our Podcast you will get to know more about Holly & Brooklyn as we discuss the commonalities and differences of our lives. Join us as we talk about everything from our kids and our family, to video games, anime, 80's & 90's nostalgia and so much more from a Gay-Girl and Trans-Girl perspective.

description:
Home of the Honored Ones Podcast. 

"The Honored Ones Podcast" is an anime, manga and Youtube Podcast hosted by anitubers Kreams and Broken Ronin! 

We speak about Anime and Manga, the industry at large as well as how we fit into the greater anitube creator economy! Additionally we also review weekly chapters of "Jujutsu Kaisen", "My Hero Academia" , "Black Clover" and More! 

Let us know what you think and if there are any topics you would like to see us cover in the future !

title: More Than Meets These Guys: A Transformers Podcast
description:
This is the journey of two old friends revisiting the original Transformers show, episode by episode. Evan is a die-hard fan of the franchise from his wee years to present. Ed isn't really a fan, but likes a lot of adjacent properties, so he is watching as a fan of toys, sci-fi, and cartoons, but not Transformers. We guys (and occasionally maybe a gal) will be going through each episode and looking at it with adult eyes to see if it holds up or if it is an odd nostalgia trap. 

Pod Art by C E Hooper

https://discord.gg/2eAwaDR8

title: NerdFlow
description: Same nerd different flow. A solo show about all things hip hop and nerd. From anime to gaming news

title: Shooting Brats
description:
Dos chicas apasionadas de las historias, las películas, el anime, la literatura y más. Análisis, comentarios, discusiones, a veces peleas, pero siempre un rato agradable.
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDte1vTa_CZl_js2meq2hcQ

title: Mad Millennial Media Munchers
description:
Zach and Julianna are longtime friends from the west coast of Canada who both love Video Games, Anime, Cosplay, and all kinds of other media. So they decided... why not start a podcast to talk about it?

Heavily inspired by the likes of Let's Fight a Boss, Castle Super Beast, and other media discussion podcasts, we hope you enjoy our unique flavor and take on this podcast format, and that you don't find us too awkward.

Thanks for reading this and for listening to the show!

title: Burdens To Society
description: Have you ever read a bad fanfiction and wished there was funny and witty commentary following along? Wondered what artist has taken your favorite stories, shit on them and handed them back to you saying, "You're welcome"? Well do we have a show for you! We're best friends Faith and Saint, and we welcome one and all to listen to the downward spiral that is the Burdens to Society.

title: Welcome to Artistoria
description: Listen along to the dramatic reading of this fantasy adventure novel: Colors of Convergence, Artistoria : Book 1 . . . . Green, Red, Blue, Yellow, Orange, Silver. In the world of Artistoria, Color has been gifted to its people. This unique form of energy, once harnessed and trained, grants a wide array of immensely special abilities. In the vast world, Owin Warstone has honed his Red in on a single purpose for his life. If he can dodge the troublesome guild he is associated with, battle through the scum of the major cities, and investigate a mysterious group that's stealing travelers from the streets, he may just be able to recruit enough allies to help further his vendetta. Leigh seems like a good ally. Her Orange is strong but she is so cagey and awkward. Why won't she talk more about her home of Amber? In the end, it doesn't matter, as long as she can fight. "How hard can it be? I'm only setting off to kill the most powerful man in the world."

title: moderate.

Our objective on this podcast is to connect the dots to lead us to find the greatest treasure of all..... friendship

title: La RetroCapsula Del Tiempo

¡Bienvenido de nuevo a tu infancia! En este Podcast reviviremos la niñez de aquellos que nacimos en México en los años 90's y principios del 2000; a través de conversaciones entre coleccionistas donde expondremos temas nostálgicos que muchos han olvidado, así como también , la exposición de material audiovisual sobre piezas que son parte de nuestras colecciones, y que merecen que el mundo las vuelva a recordar.

Por: Kike Vega & Alberto Chacón

description:
An all encompassing One Piece podcast. Join the crew to discuss the TCG, the Anime, Manga, and more! Some long time fans and some new fans get together and share in the enjoyment of reminiscing and theories for the future!

Check us out on social media: https://linktr.ee/onairpirates

title: Chibi & Chill: The Anime Podcast
description: Join me, Ryan, your nerdy host, on this show where we explore and discuss all things anime! This podcast is for those who love Japanese animation, manga, and Japanese pop culture. Whether you're a hardcore otaku, weeb or just someone who's always curious about Asian culture, this show is for you! Whether you're a fan of Naruto, One Piece, Sailor Moon, or any other anime series, this channel will provide you with the best anime content out there. We'll be talking about the history of anime as well as the latest news, reviews, and discussions on all things anime! From the history of anime to recommendations and more, we have you covered. Tune in now! Anime is an art form that's been around for over 100 years but it's never been more popular than it is today. From Toei Animation to Studio Ghibli, explore the history of anime with me and how it has evolved over the decades. We'll explore genres, recommendations and news stories to help you get up to speed on this extraordinary world. You can find me on Instagram, TikTok, Twitter and Facebook too for more anime content. Search Chibi Weeb Anime and you’ll find me!

title: Tf Is Anime?
description: Two dudes, one show. My roomate shows me anime’s that he’s seen before and I watch the first season for the first time, reviewing each one as someone who doesn’t generally watch them.

title: Straw Hat Social Club
description:
Join Todd and Becca as they watch the One Piece anime series for the first time. Whether you’re new to the series or an Elder Weeb, you can enjoy story recaps of each arc with commentary and trivia.

Your spoiler free guide to One Piece follows Becca, who is brand new to the series, as she is guided through the Straw Hats’ adventures by her husband Todd, who has religiously read all of the manga. Let’s celebrate the best series of all time together while Todd slowly melts into a skeleton after realizing he’s the Elder Weeb in this partnership.

title: Anime 1-A
description:
Class is about to be in session with Anime 1 - A! Join Chris as he learns from a rotating panel of professors the good, the bad, and the indifferent of Japanese animation.

They'll talk about what they're currently watching, and what they're looking forward to, and give anime newbie Chris suggestions on what he should be watching!

Find us wherever you get your podcasts!

Japan Hell is a definitely straightforward podcast connecting you to the land of the rising sun, and not absolute brainmelting horseshit nonsense ;)

title: BobsterCast
description: Welcome to Bobstercast, the ultimate podcast for fans of the beloved animated series Bob's Burgers! Join us as we dive deep into the world of the Belcher family, their quirky friends, and the hilarious hijinks they get up to on a daily basis. Each episode, our trio of hosts will take you on a journey through the show, discussing everything from the latest episode to fan theories and behind-the-scenes insights. We'll break down each character's unique personality traits, delve into their relationships, and explore their quirks and eccentricities. But that's not all - we'll also explore the music of Bob's Burgers, discussing our favorite songs and musical numbers from the show. From "Electric Love" to "Bad Stuff Happens in the Bathroom", we'll analyze the lyrics, the melodies, and the emotions they evoke.

title: Slam anime
description: Our show, Slam Anime, is a thrilling blend of genres and narratives that aims to captivate audiences with its action-packed storytelling. Each episode takes viewers on an adrenaline-fueled journey, immersing them in dynamic visuals and intense emotions. From epic battles to heartwarming character-driven stories, Slam Anime explores a wide range of themes and genres, catering to diverse tastes within the anime community. Whether it's supernatural powers, high-stakes competitions, or heart-pounding adventures, our show offers a rollercoaster of excitement, delivering bite-sized episodes that pack a punch. Get ready to experience the future of anime, where every moment is a slam dunk of entertainment!

title: Mangaka Education: Learn about the Creative Side of Webtoons, Manga, Games & Anime
description:
Brandon Chen is a professional writer and producer in the manga and webtoon space, specializing in shonen intellectual property. He currently runs Inspired Productions, a studio that creates manga and webtoon IP slates with large publishers, such as WEBTOON, Tapas, VoyceMe, Pixelberry, and more.

Here, you can ask any questions regarding the anime, manga and webtoon space and he sits down every week to answer them!

For Brandon's games/manga/webtoons/novels, classes, merch, socials, consulting contact & more: https://brandonchen.carrd.co/

description: Welcome to our block! Kaori and Jason Rayn have been running Nerd on the Street for 4 years and have no intentions of backing down. Join us for all the nerd talk. We have anime, comic books, Disney, Lord of the Rings, Harry Potter! You name it, we got it. Follow our IG: Nerdonthestreet4life our personal IGs: witchblade22 and jasonrayn423. Subscribe to the YT channel Nerd on the Street and follow us on Tik Tok! Jasonrayn and KaoriAkari. Let's have a good time!

We'll fill our bowls with what we're watching and reading, what we are looking forward to, and discuss it all until our bowls are empty. Join us weekly and bring a spoon or chopsticks.

title: the dub cast podcast
description:
anime creators from tiktok talking anime,manga and videogames via youtube channel

https://www.youtube.com/@thedubcastpodcast_uk

title: The Owl Pod
description:
Welcome to The Owl Pod! A podcast about Disney's The Owl House. Join Marcus, Robert, and An as they break down each episode of The Owl House episode by episode every week. Check us out on YouTube too!

https://www.youtube.com/@TheOwlPod/featured

title: Wonderland Tales
description:
Welcome to "Wonderland Tales," the enchanting podcast channel where imagination comes to life! Delight in a world filled with captivating stories and whimsical adventures specially crafted for young minds.

Embark on extraordinary journeys through enchanted forests, magical kingdoms, and faraway galaxies. Each episode of "Wonderland Tales" will transport young listeners to lands of wonder, where they'll meet brave heroes, cunning fairies, talking animals, and extraordinary beings.

Our talented storytellers bring cherished classics and original narratives to life with vivid narration, delightful sound effects, and heartwarming music. Every episode will captivate the imagination of children and parents alike, fostering a love for storytelling, creativity, and the joy of learning.

Join us as we ignite the power of imagination and share invaluable life lessons hidden within these enchanting tales. "Wonderland Tales" is the perfect companion for bedtime stories, long car rides, or simply a moment of shared magic with your little ones.

Subscribe now to "Wonderland Tales" and unlock a world of endless wonders for your young dreamers. Let the adventures begin!

title: The Vidiot
description: D.M. Ramos is The Vidiot all day every day, discussing video based media, such as animation, movies television, short films and more! Join in the Vidiocracy!

title: Безславні Філологи
description: Подкаст "БЕЗСЛАВНІ ФІЛОЛОГИ" ПЕРШИЙ ТА ЄДИНИЙ ПОДКАСТ В УКРАЇНІ (це не точно, тому, будь ласка, не перевіряйте). Троє надзвичайно некваліфікованих друзів-філологів зібралися обговорювати українські та забугорні фільми та новини.

title: Action Toon Bros
description: The Action Toon Bros Podcast is BACK! Covering all the greatest animated action shows, for a variety of demographics and tones! Starting off where the old feed ended, along with all of the Movie Garbage episodes as well!

title: Café Yesterday
description: Take a seat and enjoy as we reminisce on the good old days of quality shows, movies, and more! Whether you grew up along with us, or you just want to understand what media used to be like, this is the place for you!

title: Mapache que porquería
description: 4 enfermos sobre analizan series y películas animadas de la manera mas pseudo intelectual y mamadora posible
author_name: Uriel Badillo , Camila Gonzales, Roxan Apartado, Yarensy Cuenca, Santos Latour

title: Anime Journeys - Anime & Conventions
description:
Join us in our anime adventures, recounting our personal and professional stories attending anime events and conventions! Hosted by The Kitsune Network (TKN) founder and host Krystal Kitsune and Co-hosted by Tanya Reyes (executive producer & assistant)

This podcast is part of The Kitsune Network,. The Kitsune Network is an entertainment anime media outlet. You can find exclusive anime content and interviews only on our YouTube channel and website,

Official Website:

http://thekitsunetwork.net

title: THE JERM AND MERNNY SHOW!
description: Me and Mernny Discussing Various Anime and Dokkan Topics!

title: In Popular Culture ในวัฒนธรรมร่วมสมัย
description: พอดแคสท์เล่าเรื่องบุคคลในประวัติศาสตร์ที่เราไปรู้มาจากงานอดิเรกเนิร์ดๆ

title: The Omega Corps. with Keith and Chris
description: Welcome to the Omega Corps. We are here to talk about comic books and all things comic related. The guys have spent the better part of a decade discussing comics and now we are bringing those discussions to you.

title: TaNo's Ridiculous Experience: A JoJo's Podcast
description: Two friends and relapsing weebs take you on a journey through everyone's favorite television program, JOJO'S BIZARRE ADVENTURE. Join us as we rewatch, reconsider, and re-evaluate our life choices!

title: Let’s Talk Otaku
description: New to anime? Or are you a veteran otaku? Either way this podcast is for you! Join me as I talk all things anime! From great shows to check out, who would win a fight 🧐 or the power of music in anime! There’s something for everyone!

title: LunaCast
description: Welcome to the World of Luna Comicbooks. Creator Nick Deluna and guest discuss the latest news, releases and coming attractions in the Lunaverse.

title: The Disastrous Life Of Blerds
description: Hey Everyone ! It’s Amber , Courtney and Spencer here ! We’re a podcast that speak about all things nerdy ! Whether it be anime , gaming , manga , food , music or anything in between ! This is podcast to seek !

title: WEEABOYZ PODCAST
description:
Come join our close group of friends as we discuss all things pop culture.

Every episode is recorded live on wednesday 4pm PST. https://www.twitch.tv/wbzpodcast

You can also catch the episodes uploaded on our youtube account WBZ POD. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh-FDiO4LNVQH_57naRTRtQ

title: The Battle Phase
description: Hosts Bard and Dareinger are fans of all things nerd culture. Trading Card Games, Comics, Anime, Video games and more, Bard and Dare sit down every week to talk about their favorite topics.

title: Adonime Podcast
description: The Adonime podcast will dive deep into the anime world from a Christian’s worldview hosted by Manny who will take the most popular animes, old and new, and extract Christian values that can be learned by the listeners while watching their favorite animes. Adonime is an opinion faith-based podcast that seeks to help their listeners grow in their knowledge of Christ and help them appreciate the good, beauty and truth of God shown in the anime. Finally, a space where we can talk about our love for Jesus and anime. Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/adonime/support

title: BarBearIans
description:
3 Guys Discuss Whatever we feel like, from history to video games, to life in general we talk about it all.

Listen in every week for an episode

title: Wynaut Podcast
description: This Podcast is hosted by, Brigit and Brett Bennett aka HEREBDABEAST. We will dive into anything and everything Nintendo, Xbox, Playstation, Anime, Disney, Star Wars. Any type of new Movie, TV Show, Video Game that drops, we will keep YOU in the know! Why? Wynaut talk about it!

title: Blue Mist Podcasts
description: Hey everyone this a podcast that covers many different topics such as, Anime, Sports, Games, and much more!

title: Shojo's Bizarre Adventure
description: Shojo's Bizarre Adventure Podcast is created by women for women (but everyone is welcomed to listen in). Join hosts Stella Luna and Laura Neuzeth as we chat about anime, manga, and being female content creators in a male dominated world. New podcast episodes on Sunday at 3pm PST/6PM EST!

title: The BL Rant Den
description: Welcome to the Den! This is the official home of the BL Rant Den podcast. It is run by Nini & Pebbles when they are not facing major burnout. We’re two girls who use manga, manhwa, anime, donghua & beyond, as escapism. We live in Europe & we are using the word “live” liberally since all of the tea we spill is fictional. If you enjoy discussions about the morality of fictional characters & especially BL characters, then make sure to join our podcast.

title: Blood Moon Bobby
description:
Do you enjoy playing video games and want to learn about related events like Nintendo Direct? Or do you enjoy thrilling animated television shows like The Owl House? In either case, Blood Moon Bobby and his pals will take you on an exciting voyage across video games and animation. Become a subscriber to be notified when our next thrilling episode is released!

Intro and Outro Music:

"Who Likes to Party" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

title: Beginner`s Guide to One Piece
description: The Ultimate Guide to One Piece for Beginners by a Beginner
